net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.ref

Class TextLongReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.ref.AbstractReference
      • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.ref.TextLongReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Byteable, LongReference, net.openhft.chronicle.core.values.LongValue

    public class TextLongReference
extends AbstractReference
implements LongReference
    reference to an array fo 32-bit in values in Text wire format.
